channel.title: Simple Minecraft House
channel.description:
Well I decided to make a simple house in minecraft, so here it is!
Firstly, my house has floors of cake because I love cake, it also looks nice, and if however a monster comes inside it can be used as eatable carpet :D
My first floor where I farm stuff and also do fishing here.
[img]http://www.artyarts.com/images/1.png[/img]
My bedroom extended out, table on right jukebox infront of me, and crafting tables on the far right
[img]http://www.artyarts.com/images/2.png[/img]
I have a toy train, a chest to store items, a bookcase and some stairs to my first floor.
[img]http://www.artyarts.com/images/3.png[/img]
My door to the lookout area.
[img]http://www.artyarts.com/images/4.png[/img]

item.title: Simple Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“skander1345, post:20, topic:380175”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=476016.msg3481482#msg3481482 date=1296175056]

Why is it that everything you make, is so horrible designed?

If you don’t like it, fuck off god damn troller… And no it isn’t horrid to me otherwise I would build it another way… So run along and build cactuses…

Sorry if I like to design my things with style and not cramping everything into one space. I’m mainly commenting because the designs you make appeal to you and MAY appeal to SOME. But I’m sure a vast majority would take a look at this house and just say…wtf.
[/quote]
just going to say, you’ve got owned… your statement is “false” because i like this house.
now go cry like a bitch… stupid troll head.[/quote]
No he didn’t.

LilXCj:

But I’m sure a vast majority would take a look at this house and just say…wtf.

LilXCj:

But I’m sure a [size=18pt]vast majority[/size] would take a look at this house and just say…wtf.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:380175”]I think the house looks pretty nice.

It’s stupid and useless to say that someone’s creation is ugly, or useless, or whatever. If you can’t leave constructive criticism, don’t leave any at all. The purpose of a creative game like this is that people can build things the way they like them, if you don’t like it that way, you don’t have to look at it or comment.[/quote]

Thanks Mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:19, topic:380175”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=476016.msg3481762#msg3481762 date=1296214198]

Rule #1

Don’t make a house out of wood.

Yes I know that wood catches on fire, it was for decoration and also is useful

@Lil, post me some of your buildings you have made that (aren’t leeched) maybe I don’t always create new whacky designs but do you? Let me build how I want because if I applied myself to build like that I probably could.

I don’t build on classic or use invedit to build either. I built a small city through scavenged materials and you can find the thread for it on here. Mainly because I lag a lot of the time due to a semi-bad computer and graphics card.
[/quote]

Aren’t you lagging from all that lying and trolling?[/quote]

No.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think the house looks pretty nice.

It’s stupid and useless to say that someone’s creation is ugly, or useless, or whatever. If you can’t leave constructive criticism, don’t leave any at all. The purpose of a creative game like this is that people can build things the way they like them, if you don’t like it that way, you don’t have to look at it or comment.

item.title: Simple Minecraft House
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

Also if you saw my other post HERE you can see that I don’t design shit small… But that was in classic, and this? I’m sure you can see that its beta… And if it appeals to ONLY SOME then I’m happy with that. I dont want your input if its just going to be hating on my thread GTFO pl0x ;D and THIS:[quote]Why is it that everything you make, is so horribly designed?[/quote] doesn’t seem like contructive criticism at all…

Why did you immediately think I’m trying to give you constructive criticism? I’m simply stating I don’t like the way they look. The way you design the other “builds” wasn’t too appealing either. I’m not hating either. Simply stating an opinion.

Looks like I blew an h1 sk1ller bomb.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Sorry if I like to design my things with style and not cramping everything into one space. I’m mainly commenting because the designs you make appeal to you and MAY appeal to SOME. But I’m sure a vast majority would take a look at this house and just say…wtf.[/quote]Not really… at all. The design may look bad, but have you even looked at what it is made of? Cake and minecart tracks, It may not be the most aesthetically pleasing home, but it sure is useful.
